Articles.Content:
someone emailed me this.... what is it and where do I get it?

and who is the genius behind it? help me KSP'ers your my only hope

EDIT: turns out this is a mod being developed by a guy/girl named H0gdr1v3r and isnt out yet, if I were you guys I would head over to his/her youtube page and show some serious support!

Edited September 11, 2012 by Pleborian
new info
WOW I WANT THAT SO BADLY!!!! also nice series pleborian. Looking forward for the next episode.
Maybe a leak of 0.17, a top secret project, I won't get my hopes up though
Maybe... It is still amazing
Glorious, just... glorious!
Wow, that looks cool. Too bad it's not out yet. With the dozens of buttons it doesn't look very user-friendly, but it's still a docking mod. I'll take it.

Maybe a leak of 0.17, a top secret project, I won't get my hopes up though

Dont look like the 0.17 skybox

i want it now
The dev is a god among men for bringing this out early
EPIC it cant wait!!!! is it fake? idk
What I want to know is how much of this was autopilot and how much of it was manual, orbital rendezvous is very hard for me at the moment.
All the buttons seem to be just for aligning, which could be done manually. Definently going to download this when its finished!

All the buttons seem to be just for aligning, which could be done manually. Definently going to download this when its finished!

Guess I have to just keep praying there will be an update to mechjebs module or maybe another mod that helps me out more.

Also does anyone know how they moved the screen like that during the EVA? Was that a different mod?
Someone give this guy a medal.

1.Make giant interplanataryship

2. Rendevouz with ship and dock small lander

3.?????

4. LETS FKING DO THIS!!! *blasts into deep space*

This is.. impressive!

Download link pls?
Thats.... just incredibill

This is.. impressive!

Download link pls?

i believe it's not done yet.

Also does anyone know how they moved the screen like that during the EVA? Was that a different mod?

Hold down your middle mouse button and move the mouse, it'll change the camera like that =3
I wanna give him/her some money. I really want this so bad
_Release!! , omg now i wait for 0.17 and this!
I haven't watched the video but I'm guessing this allows for time acceleration?
this + 0.17 = EASIER WAY TO GET TO PLANETS :D

I haven't watched the video but I'm guessing this allows for time acceleration?

thats acctualy a good question, if not, then its not as good , cuz nobody would ever do a interplanetary in x1, or even with the new x4 without rails.
Im going to make a ship like the one in Space Odyssey Voyage to the planet and travel across the solar system

The thing is: this mod IS awesome, too awesome... To me it seems like that is some early testing on docking from one of the dev's.

The way the UI looks, the way how the spacecraft's "bump" together.

I am not saying that i don't like the mod... seriously that mod is great and i think if he is going to continue on that mod, Squad is going to have a new member soon for me it just looks too perfect.

And i'm also not saying he stole it or something (god no! XD) But maybe it's just my natural paranoia
